meanings.sent1: I televiewed my favorite show last night.
meanings.sent2: She televiewed the news every evening.
meanings.sent3: The cat televiewed the birds on the screen with curiosity.
meanings.sent4: His eyes televiewed the unfolding drama on the TV as if it were real life.
meanings.sent5: Televiewed programs can be entertaining and informative.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I televiewed a movie with my friends.
meanings.sent2: They televiewed the game they missed due to work.
meanings.sent3: The dog televiewed the dog show and barked at the screen.
meanings.sent4: Her mind televiewed memories of the past like a movie reel.
meanings.sent5: Televiewed shows bring back memories of cozy family nights.
